First-principles simulations have been carried out using a full-potential full-relativistic Green function method within the multiple scattering theory, specially designed as for bulks and for semiinfinite systems such as surfaces and interfaces
29, 30 . The calculations were performed within the density functional theory in a generalized gradient approximation
31 . The angular momentum cutoff was taken to be l
max = 3 and a Γ-centered (30 × 30 × 12) k-mesh was used.
